channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Multiple potholes., 19th March
item.description:
Multiple pot holes on East End Road, either side of Peel Close junction. More potholes than road surface. An absolute disgrace and dangerous to cyclists in the dark. More like a farm track!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Peel Close, East End
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped fridge, 19th March
item.description:
A fridge has been left on the grass verge in Griffith's Avenue near the junction with Oldfield Crescent. Please could you pick it up?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 James Court Griffiths Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large hole, 19th March
item.description:
Entering the roundabout in lane 3 (coming from birdlip) large pot hole
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes, 19th March
item.description:
At the Two Hedges Road end of Linworth Road there are about 6/8 huge potholes. They have been patched and have reappeared - who were the contractors and why have they done such poor work?? The road needs resurfacing not patching. Further down Linworth Road there are more potholes that need repairing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Jesson Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Improve signage for vulnerable users, 19th March
item.description:
Lack of signage proving to drivers that the road is for all road users. Numerous times cyclists have been near passed and car drivers along this "wide" road. Clearly proves some are ignorant to the highway code or law and try to school vulnerable road users. Please provide clear markings that indicate vulnerable users are permitted to use the towns roads also! Roads are not just for cars! Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 88 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lack of signage, 19th March
item.description:

item.title: Large graffiti/profanity on bus shelter, 19th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Lynworth Exchange Mendip Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked drains - could not pass on bike!, 19th March
